name: International Super Animal World Cup DELUXE!
name_original: International Super Animal World Cup DELUXE!
description:
Some animals wanted to try sports and here they are!
At the Sports World Cup! Play Soccer, Basketball, or even King of the Hill!

Only ONE BUTTON game! Use your mouse

I made it alone in 2 days for a GameJam, but it's a prototype for a mobile version with Multiplayer.

#arcade #sports #other #worldcup #gamejam
